data.text:
Distance between Kirti Nagar Metro Station and Chittaranjan Park is 22.00 kms or 13.67 miles or 11.88 nautical miles.

Origin

Kirti Nagar Metro Station, Patel Rd, Delhi, India

Destination

Chittaranjan Park, New Delhi, Delhi, India

Driving Distance

22.00 kms or 13.67 miles or 11.88 nautical miles

Driving Time

32 minutes

It takes 32 minutes to travel from Kirti Nagar Metro Station to Chittaranjan Park.

Approximate driving distance between Kirti Nagar Metro Station and Chittaranjan Park is 22.00 kms or 13.67 miles or 11.88 nautical miles. Travel time refers to the time taken if the distance is covered by a car.

On the table above you can see driving distance in various units namely kilo metres, miles and nautical miles.

1 Mile is about 1609 metres. 1 Nautical Mile is exactly 1852 metres.
